caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A high-ranking man is giving orders to his subordinates and asking them questions. After receiving their answers, he makes some decisions and leaves the room.In a castle, a woman is keeping a shorter man in custody, while in another room, a man tries to seduce another woman. They appear to be acquaintances, but the woman on the bed rejects his advances. Their conversation becomes intense, but ultimately, the shorter man is still held captive.In a cave-like chamber, two men are cleaning up one another. They chat while doing so, seemingly discussing important matters. Later, one of the men goes to meet a rather plump man, who appears to be the king.
